name: Forge Domain
description: Forge domain clerics venerate deities of crafting and creation.

1.name: Bonus Proficiency
1.description: Gain proficiency with heavy armor and smith's tools.

1.name: Blessing of the Forge
1.description: At the end of a long rest, imbue a nonmagical weapon or armor with a +1 bonus until your next long rest.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Artisan's Blessing
2.description: Create a simple or martial weapon, armor, or other metal object worth up to 100 gp after a 1-hour ritual.

6.name: Soul of the Forge
6.description: Gain resistance to fire damage and a +1 AC bonus while wearing heavy armor.

8.name: Divine Strike
8.description: Once on each turn, deal an extra 1d8 fire damage on a weapon attack (2d8 at 14th level).

17.name: Saint of Forge and Fire
17.description: You are immune to fire damage and have resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage while wearing heavy armor.
